columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the health entity.

columns.name: entity_url
columns.description: The URL of the affected entity.

columns.name: entity_value
columns.description: The ID of the affected entity.

columns.name: event_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the health event.

columns.name: last_updated_time
columns.description: The most recent time that the entity was updated.

columns.name: status_code
columns.description: The most recent status of the entity affected by the event. The possible values are IMPAIRED, UNIMPAIRED, and UNKNOWN.
